name: Transverse Aorta
desc: Transverse: video Loop sweeping through aorta

name: Proximal Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Mid Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Distal Aorta
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Aortic Bifurcation
desc: One of four transverse still views (Proximal, Mid, Distal, and Bifurcation).

name: Sagittal Aorta
desc: Sagittal clip of the Aorta

name: Sagittal
desc: Sweeping through the gallbladder

name: Transverse
desc: Two orthogonal stills (though clips are preferred)

name: Anterior Wall
desc: Must have measurement of anterior wall

name: Femoral Vein
desc: Must include either stills or videos of compression from the saphenofemoral junction through the bifurcation of the common femoral vein to superficial and deep

name: Popliteal Vein
desc: Must include the popliteal vein throught the bifurcation

name: RUQ
desc:
Must show:
• Morrison's Pouch
• Inferior renal pole
• Diaphragm

name: LUQ
desc:
Must show:
• Splenorenal space
• Caudal spleen tip
• Diaphragm

name: Suprapubic (Sagittal)
desc: Sagittal bladder view.

name: Subxiphoid
desc: Assess for pericardial effusion. Could be any other cardial views (need two).

name: Right Lung
desc: Assess for pneumothorax

name: Anterior
desc: Looking for lung sliding. Recall, stills saved for pneumothorax must be m-mode

name: Lateral
desc: Looking for lung sliding. Stills are saved for pneumothorax must be m-mode

name: Posterior
desc: Use low frequency probe to look for B-lines. Set depth to 18cm.

name: CVP/Diaphragm
desc: Central venous pressure and diaphragm

name: Sagittal
desc: Must show endometrial stripe and posterior cul de sac

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the uterus

name: Crown Rump Length
desc: Assessment of crown rump length

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the eye

name: Transverse ONSD
desc: Assessment diameter of the optic nerve sheath

name: Sagittal
desc: Transverse view of the eye

name: Frame + Measurement
desc: Sagittal frame of the Sagittal Aorta with measurement

name: Common Femoral Vein
desc: Image of the Common Femoral Vein

name: Left Lung
desc: Assess for pneumothorax

name: Suprapubic (Transverse)
desc: Transverse bladder view.

name: Fetal Heart Rate
desc: If FHR measured, must use M-mode. Avoid pulse wave doppler

name: Right Adnexa
desc: Examination of right adnexa for potential mass

name: Left Adnexa
desc: Examination of left adnexa for potential mass

name: Common Bile Duct
desc: Assess common bile duct for obstruction or masses

name: Heart
desc: Assess heart rate, EF, and contractility

name: IVC
desc: Assess vena cava responsiveness with respiration

name: Morison's Pouch
desc: Assess Morison's pouch for potential internal bleeding

name: Aorta
desc: Assess aorta for potential ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysm

name: Pulmonary
desc: Assess lungs for potential tension pneumothorax

name: Measurement
desc: Assess lungs for potential tension pneumothorax

name: Respiratory Variation
desc: Assess lungs for potential tension pneumothorax

name: Sagittal
desc: Sagittal view of the uterus

name: Transverse
desc: Transverse view of the uterus

name: Biparietal diameter
desc: Measurement of one parietal bone to another, used to estimate fetal weight and gestational age.

name: Head Circumference
desc: Measurement of the head circumference

name: Femur Length
desc: Length of fetal femur length

name: Fetal Heart Rate
desc: Assessment of the fetal heart rate

name: Sagittal ONSD
desc: Assessment diameter of the optic nerve sheath
